name: Opening Up in Lockdown
description:
Anticipating the newly-announced lockdown period, you expect to go through the drudgeries of daily life trapped inside by yourself. But are you truly alone? Interact with your home, loved ones, your community, and -- most importantly -- yourself, as you build connections in bleak times.

  • Live and thrive through the time the world stood still.
  • Experience the game as Alex: a twenty-year old totally “totally normal” college student, who inadvertently becomes stuck in lockdown.
  • You go through the drudgeries of life, seeking meaning in both social bonds and home activities. Interact with your home, loved ones, -- and learn more about truly living -- as you build connections in bleak times.

Made in one week for the 2020 SEA Game Jam+ (with the theme connections). Created by Totally Devs!. Future updates may be coming!
